subject: Suits and Litigation
Women
lead_paragraph: Since winning her sexual-harassment lawsuit against the Knicks, Anucha Browne Sanders is being hailed as a feminist icon. But her heightened public profile has become its own trial.
snippet: Since winning her sexual-harassment lawsuit against the Knicks, Anucha Browne Sanders is being hailed as a feminist icon. But her heightened public profile has become its own trial.
